Acquisition of Maxwell Energy Systems Private Limited:On May 8, 2025, Endurance Technologies announced the acquisition of a 100% stake in Maxwell Energy Systems Private Limited.

Voluntary Separation Scheme (VSS):The company accepted the separation of 57 permanent workmen at its Waluj plant under a VSS, entailing a payout of approximately Rs. 106.35 million.

Capacity Expansion and New Orders:Endurance Technologies is undertaking capital expenditure to expand capacity for its ABS and brake systems, and has won new orders for suspensions and braking systems in FY25, particularly from two-wheeler OEMs and e-scooter manufacturers.

Merger of Italian Subsidiaries:The company planned to merge its three Italian subsidiaries (Endurance Engineering S.r.l, Endurance S.p.A, and Endurance Castings S.p.A) to consolidate operations and improve efficiency,according to scanx.trade.

The Endurance company you are referring to is likely Endurance Technologies Limited , an Indian multinational automotive component manufacturer.
